ai-patthana15.6:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.6:1.1_0: There is no principle with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana15.6:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
